sentences.sContent: Traditionally cut blue jeans carry a whiff of the laborer about them, so denim on a leader suggests a willingness to roll up the sleeves and dig in.
sentences.sContent_eng: Traditionally cut blue jeans carry a whiff of the laborer about them, so denim on a leader suggests a willingness to roll up the sleeves and dig in.
sentences.sCn: 传统剪裁的蓝色牛仔裤带有一种劳动者的气息，因此领导者穿着仔裤可以表达一种愿意卷起袖子大干一场的意思。

sentences.sContent: It is no use offering the manual laborer, tired out with a hard week’s sweat and effort, the chance of playing a game of football or baseball on Saturday afternoon.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is no use offering the manual laborer, tired out with a hard week’s sweat and effort, the chance of playing a game of football or baseball on Saturday afternoon.
sentences.sCn: 对于那些体力劳动者来说，一周辛苦的工作使他们精疾力竭，因此在周六下午给他们提供踢足球或者打棒球的机会是没有意义的。

sentences.sContent: Basically, in 2009, the life of a wage laborer has the same essential features in every corner of the globe.
sentences.sContent_eng: Basically, in 2009, the life of a wage laborer has the same essential features in every corner of the globe.
sentences.sCn: 在2009年，工资劳动者的生活，其基本特征在全球的各个角落都是大致相同的。

words.tran: 吃力的；费劲的；不自然的
工作；劳动；分娩（labor的过去分词）
劳动；努力；为…所苦恼；艰难地行进（labour的ing形式）
